message.content:
{"id": "14197", "title": "Removing a working set immediately makes changes", 
"description": "When a working set is removed, the changes are applied immediately.", 
"OB": "1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. The package view should be filtered based on the working set.", 
"EB": "1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. The package view is filtered based on the working set.
3. Open the working set dialog again.
4. Create a second working set.
5. Delete the first working set.", 
"SR": "To fix this issue:
1. Investigate why the changes are being applied immediately when a working set is removed.
2. Ensure that the changes are only applied after confirming the removal of the working set.
3. Update the working set functionality to correctly handle the removal of working sets without immediately applying the changes."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

', 'EB': '', 'SR': '200204181. create a working set with one project and select it package view is filtered2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, delete thefirst. '}
